item.title: Spawn on Command
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I want my barrows brothers to spawn when you use a key with a spade. Right now, All they do is just autospawn in their tomb. But I want so that when you use the key with the spade, you will tele to the next tomb, and they will spawn right next to you.
Here’s what it looks like now, what should I add?

else if(itemUsed == 85 && useWith == 952) //Spade With Dharoks Shiney Key { teleportToX = 3576; teleportToY = 9708; heightLevel = -1; deleteItem(85, getItemSlot(85), 1); sendMessage("Wow,You Survived,Lets try Verac now."); }

Read full topic
